hits.title: LangChain: Chat with Your Data
hits.description: Create a chatbot with LangChain to interface with your private data and documents. Learn from LangChain creator, Harrison Chase.

description.value: Create a chatbot with LangChain to interface with your private data and documents. Learn from LangChain creator, Harrison Chase.

hits.title: Generative AI with LLMs
hits.description: Understand the generative AI lifecycle. Describe transformer architecture powering LLMs. Apply training/tuning/inference methods. Hear from researchers on generative AI challenges/opportunities.
hits.instructors: Antje Barth, Chris Fregly, Shelbee Eigenbrode Instructor, Mike Chambers

description.value: Understand the generative AI lifecycle. Describe transformer architecture powering LLMs. Apply training/tuning/inference methods. Hear from researchers on generative AI challenges/opportunities.

hits.title: How Diffusion Models Work
hits.description: Learn and build diffusion models from the ground up, understanding each step. Learn about diffusion models in use today and implement algorithms to speed up sampling.

description.value: Learn and build diffusion models from the ground up, understanding each step. Learn about diffusion models in use today and implement algorithms to speed up sampling.

hits.title: LangChain for LLM Application Development
hits.description: Use the powerful and extensible LangChain framework, using prompts, parsing, memory, chains, question answering, and agents.

description.value: Use the powerful and extensible LangChain framework, using prompts, parsing, memory, chains, question answering, and agents.

hits.title: Building Systems with the ChatGPT API
hits.description: Learn to break down complex tasks, automate workflows, chain LLM calls, and get better outputs from LLMs. Evaluate LLM inputs and outputs for safety and relevance.

title.value: Building Systems with the ChatGPT API

description.value: Learn to break down complex tasks, automate workflows, chain LLM calls, and get better outputs from LLMs. Evaluate LLM inputs and outputs for safety and relevance.

hits.title: ChatGPT Prompt Engineering for Developers
hits.description: Learn the fundamentals of prompt engineering for ChatGPT. Learn effective prompting, and how to use LLMs for summarizing, inferring, transforming, and expanding.

description.value: Learn the fundamentals of prompt engineering for ChatGPT. Learn effective prompting, and how to use LLMs for summarizing, inferring, transforming, and expanding.

hits.title: AI for Good
hits.description: Learn a framework for AI project development. Build models for air quality, wind energy, biodiversity & disaster management. Explore case studies on public health & climate change.

description.value: Learn a framework for AI project development. Build models for air quality, wind energy, biodiversity & disaster management. Explore case studies on public health & climate change.

hits.title: Mathematics for Machine Learning and Data Science
hits.description: Explore the fundamental mathematics toolkit of machine learning: calculus, linear algebra, statistics, and probability.
hits.instructors: Luis Serrano, Anshuman Singh, Elena Sanina, Magdalena Bouza, Obed Kobina Nsiah, Lucas Coutinho

title.value: Mathematics for Machine Learning and Data Science

description.value: Explore the fundamental mathematics toolkit of machine learning: calculus, linear algebra, statistics, and probability.

hits.title: Machine Learning Specialization
hits.description: Learn foundational AI concepts through an intuitive visual approach, then learn the code needed to implement the algorithms and math for ML.
hits.instructors: Andrew Ng, Eddy Shyu, Aarti Bagul, Geoff Ladwig

description.value: Learn foundational AI concepts through an intuitive visual approach, then learn the code needed to implement the algorithms and math for ML.

hits.title: TensorFlow: Advanced Techniques
hits.description: Expand your knowledge of the Functional API, optimize training with multiple processors, and explore advanced computer vision and generative deep learning techniques.

description.value: Expand your knowledge of the Functional API, optimize training with multiple processors, and explore advanced computer vision and generative deep learning techniques.

hits.title: Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs)
hits.description: Learn image generation with GANs from basics to advanced techniques. Covers social implications like bias & privacy preservation.
hits.instructors: Sharon Zhou, Eda Zhou, Eric Zelikman

description.value: Learn image generation with GANs from basics to advanced techniques. Covers social implications like bias & privacy preservation.

hits.title: TensorFlow: Data and Deployment
hits.description: Deploy ML models on devices. Train/run models in browsers & mobile apps. Retrain deployed models while protecting privacy.

description.value: Deploy ML models on devices. Train/run models in browsers & mobile apps. Retrain deployed models while protecting privacy.

hits.title: TensorFlow Developer Professional Certificate
hits.description: Learn to build scalable AI apps with TensorFlow. Apply new skills across projects. Prep for Google TensorFlow Certificate exam.

description.value: Learn to build scalable AI apps with TensorFlow. Apply new skills across projects. Prep for Google TensorFlow Certificate exam.

hits.title: Natural Language Processing
hits.description: Design NLP apps that perform question-answering, sentiment analysis, language translation, and summarization.
hits.instructors: Younes Bensouda Mourri, Łukasz Kaiser, Eddy Shyu

description.value: Design NLP apps that perform question-answering, sentiment analysis, language translation, and summarization.

hits.title: Deep Learning Specialization
hits.description: Build neural networks (CNNs, RNNs, LSTMs, Transformers) and apply them to speech recognition, NLP, and more using Python and TensorFlow.
hits.instructors: Andrew Ng, Kian Katanforoosh, Younes Bensouda Mourri

description.value: Build neural networks (CNNs, RNNs, LSTMs, Transformers) and apply them to speech recognition, NLP, and more using Python and TensorFlow.

hits.title: AI for Medicine
hits.description: Estimate treatment effects from randomized controlled trials data. Interpret diagnostic & prognostic models. Apply NLP to extract info from unstructured medical data.
hits.instructors: Pranav Rajpurkar, Amirhossein Kiani, Bora Uyumazturk, Eddy Shyu

description.value: Estimate treatment effects from randomized controlled trials data. Interpret diagnostic & prognostic models. Apply NLP to extract info from unstructured medical data.

hits.title: AI for Everyone
hits.description: Learn about AI technologies and how to use them. Examine AI's societal impact, and learn to navigate this technological shift.

description.value: Learn about AI technologies and how to use them. Examine AI's societal impact, and learn to navigate this technological shift.
